R

Remote - Interface in agilermi
 
RemoteException - Exception in agilermi
This exception is thrown when a RmiHandler instance has been disposed before or during an invocation.
RemoteException() - Constructor for exception agilermi.RemoteException
 
removeMyStubs(Iterable<?>) - Method in class agilermi.RmiHandler
Removes all the objects that are stubs by this handler from the collection
retainMyStubs(Iterable<?>) - Method in class agilermi.RmiHandler
Removes all the objects that are not stubs by this handler from the collection
RmiHandler - Class in agilermi
 
RmiRegistry - Class in agilermi
Defines a class that accepts new TCP connections over a port of the local machine and automatically creates and manages the object sockets to export remote objects.
RmiRegistry() - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new simple RmiRegistry instance, without starting its connection listener.
RmiRegistry(FilterFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry with the given FilterFactory instance, without starting its connection listener in a daemon thread.
RmiRegistry(ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory, FilterFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry with the given ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory and FilterFactory instances, without starting the connection listener.
RmiRegistry(int) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry and automatically starts its connection listener on the given port in a daemon thread.
RmiRegistry(int, boolean) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry and automatically starts its connection listener on the given port.
RmiRegistry(int, boolean, FilterFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry and automatically starts its connection listener on the given port.
RmiRegistry(int, FilterFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry with the specified FilterFactory and automatically starts its connection listener on the given port in a daemon thread.
RmiRegistry(int, boolean, ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory, FilterFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry with the specified FilterFactory and automatically starts its connection listener on the given port in a daemon thread.
RmiRegistry(int, boolean, ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory, FilterFactory, boolean) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new RmiRegistry.
